oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multi-band rectangular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
RAY, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: multi-band rectangular microstrip antenna
midti-port network model
half u-slot
rectangular slot
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Configurations with slotted rectangular microstrip antennas using rectangular slot and half U-slot cut inside the patch for multiband operation are proposed. Also, the multi-port network- models for these multi-band rectangular microstrip antennas are proposed. (C) 2007 .
